SummaryEnglish: Rapid changes in the new century have brought forth a dangerous power capable of good or evil. Harnessing the psychic abilities of its residents, the government has turned its most gifted citizens into New Age guinea pigs, drained of their essence and discarded after serving their purpose. Loaded with action-packed excitement, startling cutting edge visuals, and memorable characters, "Psychic Force" propels you into a dynamic and exciting new world where one human's mind in the wrong hands can be explosive. Witness this new classic of anime that's sweeping up sci-fi fans in its rich mixture of stunning visual action and tense storytelling!
